headline: Nucor optimistic about demand despite tariff uncertainty
summary: Despite an 81% drop in earnings year-over-year, the steelmaker's CEO said the benefits of tariffs for the industry will outweigh any impact on raw material costs.

raw.headline: Nucor optimistic about demand despite tariff uncertainty

headline: Nucor Has Major Macroeconomic Factors Working In Its Favor
summary: Nucor rated BUY with a $147.75 target, backed by growth from U.S. tariff policies and rising domestic manufacturing boosting sales volumes. Read more about NUE stock here.
